item.title: 人工智能股票将对罗素重组产生巨大影响
item.description: 投资者正在为周五富时罗素（FTSE Russell）最终重组基准指数做准备，人工智能（AI）相关股票在过去一年中的大幅上涨预计将对其最终形态留下深刻印象。【原文：Investors are gearing up for the final reconstitution of the benchmark indexes by FTSE Russell on Friday, with the furious rally in artificial intelligence (AI) related stocks over the past year expected to leave an outsized imprint on their final shape.】

item.title: 据 The Verge 报道，谷歌将在 8 月 13 日的发布会上展示人工智能和新款 Pixel 手机
item.description: 根据 The Verge 和科技评论员马克斯-布朗利（Marques Brownlee）在网上分享的邀请函，谷歌将在 8 月 13 日举行的一次特别活动上展示人工智能功能以及 Pixel 设备和安卓平台的更新。【原文：Google will showcase artificial intelligence features, and updates to its Pixel devices and the Android platform at a special event on Aug. 13, according to invites shared online by the Verge and tech commentator Marques Brownlee.】

item.title: 独家消息消息人士称，Doordash 曾与英国 Deliveroo 就收购事宜进行谈判
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的人士告诉路透社，美国送餐集团 Doordash 最近表示有意收购英国 Deliveroo。【原文：U.S. meal delivery group Doordash recently flagged its interest in a takeover of Britain's Deliveroo , two people familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: Waymo 的自动驾驶打车服务现已在旧金山向所有人开放
item.description: Alphabet 旗下的 Waymo 公司周二表示，其自动驾驶打车服务 Waymo One 现已在旧金山向所有人开放，而在亚利桑那州凤凰城采取类似举措近四年后，这项服务也已在旧金山开放。【原文：Alphabet's Waymo said on Tuesday its autonomous ride-hailing service, Waymo One, is now available to everyone in San Francisco, nearly four years after a similar move in Phoenix, Arizona.】

item.title: Albemarle 关注锂价格，但认为长期需求强劲
item.description: 全球最大的锂生产商 Albemarle 公司的一位高管周二表示，该公司对目前用于制造电动汽车电池的金属的价格感到担忧，但相信长期需求将保持强劲。【原文：Albemarle , the world's largest lithium producer, is concerned about current prices for the metal used to make electric vehicle batteries but believes long-term demand will remain strong, an executive said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 萨巴的温斯坦称美国总统拜登对债券市场 "更有利
item.description: 著名投资经理博阿兹-温斯坦（Boaz Weinstein）周二表示，11月美国总统大选的不确定性可能会导致市场波动，但他同时也表示，乔-拜登总统对债券市场来说 "更好"。【原文：Prominent investment manager Boaz Weinstein on Tuesday said uncertainty about November's U.S. presidential election may lead to market volatility but also said President Joe Biden is "better" for the bond market.】

item.title: 受制裁船舶集团 Sovcomflot 表示制裁损害了海上安全
item.description: 受制裁的俄罗斯航运集团 Sovcomflot 首席执行官表示，对航运公司的制裁正在破坏海上安全，并由于船舶标准受到影响而给贸易带来危险。【原文：Sanctions on shipping companies are undermining safety at sea and pose dangers for trade as ship standards are impacted, the chief executive of sanctioned Russian shipping group Sovcomflot said.】

item.title: 4300 亿美元市场下滑后，英伟达股价大涨逾 5
item.description: 本周二，英伟达（Nvidia）股价上涨超过 5%，有望结束连续三个交易日的低迷走势，这使得这家人工智能芯片制造商的市值减少了约 4,300 亿美元。【原文：Shares of Nvidia were up over 5% on Tuesday, poised to snap a three-session tailspin that had erased about $430 billion from the artificial intelligence chipmaker's market value.】

item.title: 波音和空客即将达成分拆供应商的协议，Spirit Aero 的工厂成为焦点
item.description: 据路透社周二援引业内消息人士的话报道，欧洲飞机制造商空中客车公司准备接管四家 Spirit AeroSystems 公司工厂的全部或部分业务，作为竞争对手波音公司即将进行的交易的一部分。【原文：European planemaker Airbus is poised to take over all or part of the operations of four Spirit AeroSystems plants as part of an impending deal involving rival Boeing , Reuters reported on Tuesday, citing industry sources.】

item.title: 耐克季度销售增长乏力，On 和 Hoka 蚕食市场份额
item.description: 耐克将于本周四公布第四季度财报，由于缺乏创新，加上来自戴克的霍卡和罗杰-费德勒支持的安踏的竞争日益激烈，耐克的收入增长将是两年来最慢的。【原文：Nike is set to post its slowest revenue growth in two years when it reports fourth-quarter results on Thursday, due to a lack of innovation amid growing competition from Deckers' Hoka and Roger Federer-backed On .】

item.title: 路威酩轩集团收购瑞士豪华钟表制造商 L'Epee 1839
item.description: 全球最大的奢侈品集团路威酩轩集团（LVMH）周二表示，已收购总部位于瑞士的专业钟表制造商L'Epee 1839，以加强其在高端钟表制造领域的专业能力。【原文：LVMH , the world's largest luxury group, has acquired Switzerland-based speciality clock maker L'Epee 1839, boosting its expertise in high-end watch making, the company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美联储库克："总有一天 "会到降息的时候
item.description: 美联储理事丽莎-库克（Lisa Cook）周二表示，如果经济表现符合她的预期，美国央行有望降息，但她拒绝透露美联储何时能够采取行动。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook said on Tuesday the U.S. central bank is on track for a rate cut if the economy’s performance meets her expectations, but she declined to say when the Fed will be able to act.】

item.title: 科通芯城的拉丰表示地缘政治是对英伟达和芯片行业的威胁
item.description: 对冲基金Coatue Management的创始人菲利普-拉丰（Philippe Laffont）周二表示，他担心地缘政治冲突会对包括英伟达（Nvidia）在内的芯片行业和人工智能的发展产生影响。【原文：Hedge fund Coatue Management's founder Philippe Laffont said on Tuesday that he is concerned about how geopolitical conflicts could affect the chip industry and the development of artificial intelligence, including Nvidia.】

item.title: Verizon 因 2022 年 911 电话中断支付 100 万美元罚款
item.description: 威瑞森通信公司（Verizon Communications）的无线部门将支付 105 万美元的罚款，以解决该公司因在 2022 年 12 月六个州的一次故障中未能提供 911 电话服务而违反政府规定的调查。【原文：Verizon Communications' wireless unit will pay a $1.05 million fine to resolve an investigation that the company violated government rules by failing to deliver 911 calls during an outage in December 2022 in six states.】

item.title: 消息人士称，空中客车公司有意在四家 Spirit Aero 工厂开展业务
item.description: 业内人士称，空中客车公司准备接管 Spirit AeroSystems 公司四家工厂的全部或部分业务，作为即将达成的交易的一部分，该交易涉及这家美国航空结构制造商与波音公司的分拆。【原文：Airbus is poised to take over all or part of the operations of four Spirit AeroSystems plants as part of an impending deal that involves a carve-up of the U.S.-based aerostructures maker with Boeing , industry sources said.】

item.title: 埃克森公司与韩国 SK On 公司签署非约束性锂供应协议
item.description: 美国能源巨头埃克森美孚（Exxon Mobil）周二表示，该公司已经签署了一份非约束性协议，将向韩国电动汽车电池制造商SK On供应阿肯色州项目中的锂。【原文：U.S. energy major Exxon Mobil said on Tuesday it had signed a non-binding agreement to supply lithium from its proposed Arkansas project to South Korean EV battery maker SK On.】

item.title: 美国法官驳回威士卡和万事达卡 300 亿美元刷卡费和解协议
item.description: 威士公司和万事达公司同意限制向接受其信用卡和借记卡的商家收取的费用。【原文：A U.S. judge on Tuesday rejected a $30 billion antitrust settlement in which Visa and Mastercard agreed to limit fees they charge merchants who accept their credit and debit cards.】

item.title: 美国 6 月消费者信心指数略有下降
item.description: 周二的一项调查显示，由于对经济前景的担忧，6月份美国消费者信心略有下降，但家庭对劳动力市场持乐观态度，对未来一年的通胀预期也略有改善。【原文：U.S. consumer confidence eased slightly in June amid worries about the economic outlook, but households were upbeat about the labor market and their inflation expectations over the next year improved a bit, a survey showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 国际特赦组织称，Shein 的潜在 IPO 将成为伦敦政治经济学院的 "耻辱徽章
item.description: 大赦国际英国分部周二表示，Shein 可能在伦敦进行首次公开募股将成为伦敦证券交易所的 "耻辱徽章"，因为这家快速时尚公司的劳工和人权标准 "值得怀疑"。【原文：Amnesty International UK said on Tuesday Shein's potential London initial public offering would be a "badge of shame" for the London Stock Exchange because of the fast-fashion firm's "questionable" labour and human rights standards.】

item.title: 报告称大选的不确定性可能影响美国汽车业
item.description: 考克斯汽车公司（Cox Automotive）周二发布的一份报告显示，11月份的总统大选将重塑经济、影响利率或通胀水平的预期加剧了美国汽车业的不确定性。【原文：Uncertainty looms over the U.S. auto industry, fueled by expectations that the presidential elections in November will reshape the economy, affect interest rates or influence inflation levels, a report from Cox Automotive showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 数据显示，英伟达做空者从三天抛售中获利 50 亿美元
item.description: 据数据分析公司Ortex Technologies称，过去三个交易日，英伟达（Nvidia）做空者从这家人工智能芯片设计公司的大幅下挫中获得了近50亿美元的纸面利润。【原文：Nvidia short sellers have raked in nearly $5 billion in paper profits from the AI chip designer's sharp selloff over the past three sessions, according to data analytics firm Ortex Technologies.】

item.title: 伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司加快中国比亚迪的销售步伐
item.description: 沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）的伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）已加快出售中国最大的电动汽车销售商比亚迪的股票。【原文：Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway has accelerated its selling of shares in BYD , China's largest seller of electric vehicles.】

item.title: 邮轮需求稳定，嘉年华公司再次上调年度盈利预期
item.description: 嘉年华集团（Carnival Corp）周二上调了年度利润预期，这是今年以来第二次上调预期，原因是其航线价格上涨，加勒比海和阿拉斯加等目的地的游轮假期需求持续。【原文：Carnival Corp , raised its annual profit forecast on Tuesday for the second time this year, banking on higher prices for its itineraries and sustained demand for cruise holidays to destinations such as the Caribbean and Alaska.】

item.title: 法兰克福摩天大楼业主申请破产，地产危机笼罩全球
item.description: 德国银行业之都法兰克福一幢著名摩天大楼的业主已申请破产，德国正在经历一代人以来最大的房地产危机。【原文：The owner of a prominent skyscraper in Germany's banking capital of Frankfurt has filed for insolvency, as the country reels from its biggest property crisis in a generation.】

item.title: 美国 4 月房价稳步上涨 -FHFA
item.description: 4 月份，美国独户住宅价格稳步上涨，但由于借贷成本上升抑制了住房需求，导致供应增加，因此上涨势头可能放缓。【原文：U.S. single-family home prices increased at a steady clip in April, but momentum could slow as higher borrowing costs weigh on demand for housing, contributing to a rise in supply.】

item.title: 据彭博社报道，路威酩轩集团首席执行官阿尔诺持有奢侈品竞争对手历峰集团的股份
item.description: 据彭博社周二报道，欧洲首富、高级时装和香槟集团路威酩轩集团（LVMH）董事长、法国亿万富翁伯纳德-阿诺特（Bernard Arnault）收购了规模较小的奢侈品竞争对手历峰集团（Richemont）的股份。【原文：French billionaire Bernard Arnault, Europe's richest man and the chairman of high fashion to champagne group LVMH , has bought a stake in smaller luxury rival Richemont , Bloomberg reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 如果政府支持的贷款不能延期，越南国旗航空公司将面临破产风险
item.description: 越南政府周二表示，如果越南国家航空公司越南航空股份公司（Vietnam Airlines JSC）政府支持贷款的再融资还款期限不能延长，该公司最早将在 7 月份面临失去流动资金的风险。【原文：National carrier Vietnam Airlines JSC is facing the risk of losing liquidity as early as July if the refinancing loan repayment deadline for its government-backed loan is not extended, the government said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 专注于人工智能的制造初创企业从英伟达等公司融资 1.06 亿美元
item.description: 软件和机器人初创公司 Bright Machines 周二表示，该公司在 C 轮融资中筹集了 1.06 亿美元，投资方包括英伟达（Nvidia）和微软。【原文：Software and robotics startup Bright Machines raised $106 million in a Series C funding round that included Nvidia and Microsoft as investors, the company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 发动机制造商的波音困境助推空客产量计划停滞不前
item.description: 业内人士周二表示，发动机制造商CFM公司不愿在其另一主要客户波音公司面临压力之际大幅增加对空客的供应，这可能是空客推迟喷气机增产计划的一个因素。【原文：Engine maker CFM's wariness to ramp up supplies significantly to Airbus at a time of stress for its other key customer Boeing was likely a factor in Airbus' move to delay planned jet output increases, industry sources said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 中国副部长：中国欢迎美国乳品企业在华扩张
item.description: 中国商务部副部长王受文周二表示，中国欢迎包括美国在内的各国乳品企业拓展中国市场。【原文：China welcomes dairy companies from all countries, including the U.S., to expand their business in the Chinese market, Vice Minister of Commerce Wang Shouwen said on Tuesday.】
